𒌌 ≈ 𒌋𒄞 𒌋𒄑𒑊 UL <> eli 𒌋𒀸𒋰𒆸 ≈ 𒌋𒀸𒋰𒁹𒋰𒁹 ≈ 𒌋𒆳𒆸 ≈ 𒌋𒅗 UGUᴰ 𒌋𒄞 U.GUD agade 𒄢 𒌌 ULᵠ <> alpha bull 𒌋 𒄞 #alpu 𒌌 ULᵠ in ULᵠTU after 𒌌𒌅 ulˣtu achter <> 𒌋𒄞 qv/GU₄ 𒌌 ᵠUL ফল phol ফুলা phula paleo old 𒌌 ᵠUL/DU old 𒄞 GUD good old
𒌌 DU/UL dura दूर dūra 𓎛𓁷𓂋𓈐 distant ( heroic UR-Zeit ) ⲟⲩⲉⲓ

double reading

𒌌𒃻 DU.GAR დაგროვება dagroveba צָבַר tsavár kerätä "accumulate" 𒌌𒃻𒈦 ᶠUL.GAR.MAŠ felhalmozás uveličávam "accumulation (math.)"
